  • Constructor Details

    • ResnikSimilarity

      public ResnikSimilarity(MinimalOntology ontology, Map<TermId,Double> termToIc, boolean symmetric)
      Constructor.

      The internally used PrecomputingPairwiseResnikSimilarity is constructed from the given information content mapping using PairwiseResnikSimilarity. In case that you want to use perform this precomputation explicitely, use ResnikSimilarity(Ontology, PairwiseSimilarity, boolean) with PrecomputingPairwiseResnikSimilarity.

      Parameters:
      ontology - Ontology to base computations on.
      termToIc - Map from TermId to information content.
      symmetric - Whether or not to compute score in symmetric fashion.

    • ResnikSimilarity

      public ResnikSimilarity(PairwiseSimilarity pairwiseSimilarity, boolean symmetric)
      Constructor.

      By passing in the PairwiseSimilarity explicitely here, an implementation with precomputation can be passed in explicitely, performing the precomputation explicitely earlier instead of implicitely on object construction.

      Parameters:
      pairwiseSimilarity - PairwiseSimilarity to use internally.
      symmetric - Whether or not to compute score in symmetric fashion.
